item.title: Disproportionately high complaints of dog fouling in the area, 14th August
item.description:
Bromley Council Note: The number of dog fouling complaints in the area, as confirmed by the review of multiple reports lodged on Bromley’s “Fix My Street” website. Its clear theres evidence to reveal a pattern of ongoing neglect.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Newlands Park, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Laughing gas cylinder, Litter, plastic & glass bottles & 2 big boxes, 14th August
item.description:
Bins urgently needed in barham Road. Seeing as the street has turned into a dumping ground. The laughing gas cylinder and boxes have been there a while, so no the council aren't cleaning the street enough. Raising the council tax and doing nothing for it. Its becoming a joke

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 37 - 59, Barham Road, Chislehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet
